Sentencas: A novel numerical methodology for predicting the electrochemical characteristics of a practical-size solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is proposed.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: The core idea is to divide the practical-size cell into independent one-dimensional (1D) unit cells and to evaluate the characteristics of the practical-size cell as an aggregation of the performance of local unit cells.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: The proposed methodology consists of two steps.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: The first is to construct a database of the electrochemical performance of the unit cells under a comprehensive range of operating conditions.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: For this purpose, a 1D numerical simulation model is developed and validated by comparing the predicted values with experimental data.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: It is confirmed that not only the current-voltage characteristics but also the impedance characteristics are accurately reproduced by the developed unit cell model.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: The second is to reproduce the performance of the practical-size cell using the constructed database.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: The cell is considered as an assembly of unit cells and the electrochemical performance of each unit cell is determined by referring to the constructed database.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: Subsequently, the macroscopic characteristics of the entire cell are evaluated by using the derived theoretical expressions correlating the macroscopic characteristics with the local electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: The predicted cell characteristics fairly agree with the experimental data found in the literature.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance

Sentencas: Since the macroscopic characteristics of the practical-size cell is evaluated with simple arithmetic expressions, the computational cost is significantly reduced, which realizes an exhaustive parametric study of the practical-size cell to identify the optimal operation conditions.
Titulo: Prediction of electrochemical characteristics of practical-size solid oxide fuel cells based on database of unit cell performance
